trans-unit.source: Defines a blend pattern for a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Define um padrão de mesclagem para um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Gradients are commonly used to smoothly shade the interiors of shapes.
trans-unit.target: Gradientes são usadas para sombrear perfeitamente os interiores das formas.

trans-unit.source: A blend pattern is defined by two arrays (<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>) that each contain the same number of elements.
trans-unit.target: Um padrão de mesclagem é definido por duas matrizes (<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A>) que contêm o mesmo número de elementos.

trans-unit.source: Each element of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> array represents a proportion of the distance along the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: Cada elemento do <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> matriz representa uma proporção da distância ao longo da linha de gradação.

trans-unit.source: Each element of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> array represents the proportion of the starting and ending colors in the gradient blend at the position along the gradient line represented by the corresponding element in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> array.
trans-unit.target: Cada elemento do <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> matriz representa a proporção de cores na mistura gradiente na posição ao longo da linha de gradação representada pelo elemento correspondente no inicial e final a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> matriz.

trans-unit.source: For example, if corresponding elements of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> arrays are 0.2 and 0.3, respectively, for a linear gradient from blue to red along a 100-pixel line, the color 20 pixels along that line (20 percent of the distance) consists of 30 percent blue and 70 percent red.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se correspondente elementos do <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> matrizes são 0.2 e 0,3, respectivamente, para um gradiente linear de azul para vermelho ao longo de uma linha de 100 pixels, e os pixels de cor 20 ao longo da linha (20 por cento da distância) consiste em 30 por cento azul e 70% de vermelho.

trans-unit.source: The following example is intended to be used in a Windows Forms environment.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir se destina a ser usado em um ambiente de Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: It demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> class in conjunction with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> class to draw an ellipse to screen that has its colors blended.
trans-unit.target: Ele demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> classe junto com o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> classe para desenhar uma elipse na tela que tem as cores mescladas.

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is blue on the left, blends to red in the center, and blends back to blue on the right.
trans-unit.target: Elipse é azul à esquerda, mesclagens em vermelho no centro, e mesclagens de volta para azul à direita.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished through the settings in the `myFactors` and `myPositions` arrays used in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito por meio das configurações no `myFactors` e `myPositions` matrizes usadas no <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> object named `lgBrush2` must be made equal to the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> object `myBlend`.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> propriedade o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> objeto chamado `lgBrush2` devem ser feitas igual ao <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> objeto `myBlend`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example is intended to be used in a Windows Forms environment.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir se destina a ser usado em um ambiente de Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: It demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> class in conjunction with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> class to draw an ellipse to screen that has its colors blended.
trans-unit.target: Ele demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> classe junto com o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> classe para desenhar uma elipse na tela que tem as cores mescladas.

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is blue on the left, blends to red in the center, and blends back to blue on the right.
trans-unit.target: Elipse é azul à esquerda, mesclagens em vermelho no centro, e mesclagens de volta para azul à direita.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished through the settings in the `myFactors` and `myPositions` arrays used in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito por meio das configurações no `myFactors` e `myPositions` matrizes usadas no <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> object named `lgBrush2` must be made equal to the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> object `myBlend`.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> propriedade o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> objeto chamado `lgBrush2` devem ser feitas igual ao <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> objeto `myBlend`.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions" /> arrays.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos nas matrizes <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend" /> class with the specified number of factors and positions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend" /> com o número especificado de fatores e posições.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para ver um exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of blend factors for the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma matriz de fatores de mesclagem para o gradiente.

trans-unit.source: An array of blend factors that specify the percentages of the starting color and the ending color to be used at the corresponding position.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de fatores de mesclagem que especificam as porcentagens da cor inicial e a cor final a ser usada na posição correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the elements of this array are a value from 0.0f through 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os elementos dessa matriz são um valor de 0.0 f por meio de 1.0 f.

trans-unit.source: These elements specify the percentages of the ending color and the starting color to use at the corresponding blend position.
trans-unit.target: Esses elementos especificam a posição do blend as porcentagens da cor final e a cor inicial a ser usada em correspondente.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 0.2 indicates that at the specified position, the blended color is composed of 20 percent of the ending gradient color and 80 percent of the starting gradient color.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um valor de 0,2 indica que, na posição especificada, a cor combinada é composta de 20 por cento de cor final do gradiente e 80 por cento de cor inicial do gradiente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> class by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> classe definindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that imports the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código em um formulário que importa o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DemonstrateBlend` method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Controlar o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos e chamadas de `DemonstrateBlend` método, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of blend positions for the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma matriz de posições de mesclagem para o gradiente.

trans-unit.source: An array of blend positions that specify the percentages of distance along the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de posições de mesclagem que especificam as porcentagens de distância ao longo da linha de gradação.

trans-unit.source: The elements of this array specify percentages of distance along the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos dessa matriz especificam porcentagens de distância ao longo da linha de gradação.

trans-unit.source: For example, an element value of 0.2f specifies that this point is 20 percent of the total distance from the starting point.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um valor de elemento de 0.2f Especifica que esse ponto é 20 por cento da distância total do ponto de partida.

trans-unit.source: The elements in this array are represented by float values between 0.0f and 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos nesta matriz são representados por valores de ponto flutuante entre 0.0 f e 1.0 f.

trans-unit.source: The first element of the array must be 0.0f, and the last element must be 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro elemento da matriz deve ser 0.0 f e o último elemento deve ser 1.0 f.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> class by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> classe definindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Factors%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend.Positions%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that imports the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código em um formulário que importa o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DemonstrateBlend` method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Controlar o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos e chamadas de `DemonstrateBlend` método, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
